name: Cat Saviour: The Rain Is Coming
name_original: Cat Saviour: The Rain Is Coming
description:
Save all the cats before the rain comes!

The more cats you have the less you can move.

Crank up the volume to enjoy our subtle sound effects ;)

Ludum Dare 40 entry. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/cat-saviour-the-rain-is-coming
